level.heading: Licensee liability.
level.text: The liability of a licensee to any person for a money transmission conducted by the licensee, or an authorized delegate of the licensee, on behalf of the person shall be limited to the amount of money transmitted or the face amount of the payment instrument purchased.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-140
level.text: For Law 13-140, see notes following ยง 26-1001.
